official_title: To strengthen and enhance the authority to discipline officers and employees of the Federal Government for violating the Anti-Deficiency Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: Anti-Deficiency Reform and Enforcement Act of 2019
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
The Anti-Deficiency Reform and Enforcement Act of 2019

This bill strengthens penalties for federal employees who violate the Anti-Deficiency Act. Additionally, the bill authorizes an agency to award a cash payment to an employee who discloses a potential violation of the Anti-Deficiency Act, and it requires the Inspector General of each agency to assess biennially whether any such violation occurred at the agency.
